```scss
// Property: cameraAuthorization
// Description: Returns the authorization status for the camera.
// Component(s): Ti.Media
'.camera-authorization-authorized': { cameraAuthorization: Ti.Media.CAMERA_AUTHORIZATION_AUTHORIZED }
'.camera-authorization-denied': { cameraAuthorization: Ti.Media.CAMERA_AUTHORIZATION_DENIED }
'.camera-authorization-restricted': { cameraAuthorization: Ti.Media.CAMERA_AUTHORIZATION_RESTRICTED }
'.camera-authorization-unknown': { cameraAuthorization: Ti.Media.CAMERA_AUTHORIZATION_UNKNOWN }
```
